code: import React from"react";import{createContext,useState,useEffect}from"react";import{getCategoriesAndDocument}from"../utils/firebase/firebase.utils.js";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const CategoriesContext=/*#__PURE__*/createContext({categoryMap:{}});export const CategoriesProvider=_ref=>{let{children}=_ref;const[categoryMap,setCategoryMap]=useState({});useEffect(()=>{const getCategories=async()=>{const categoryMap=await getCategoriesAndDocument();setCategoryMap(categoryMap);};getCategories();},[]);const value={categoryMap,setCategoryMap};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CategoriesContext.Provider,{value:value,children:children});};
